name: Space Cruiser (snehit)
description:
D-day Space Ship is  Lost In The Oblivion. Only Option Is To Fight Its Way Back . you are in Command Of the Kyper - A Forgotten Hero. Dodge all the obstacles coming its way to reach the  glory . Kyper Needs YOU.

P.S. - if any Feed back or bugs can reach out to the developer at snehitsharma@outlook.com.

CONTROLS:

W - Thrust

A and D to rotate
